about_the_game:
Andalun and Confunia, ruled by the Goddess of Order and Goddess of Chaos.
One day, the Goddess of Chaos disappears and monster queens appear in Confunia.
To keep the monster queens in check, Traborn, the leader of the Knights of Order, went on an expedition to Confunia under orders from the Goddess of Order.
Through the expedition, Traborn personally obtained an oath of loyalty from all the monster queens of Confunia.
He made himself Overlord of Confunia and signed a peace treaty with the Andalun.
And Traborn fell into a deep sleep to control the power he received from the Monster Queens...
When he woke up after a long time, the promised peace did not exist.



Gather monster queens and rebuild your castle.
You must take back your power and hold them accountable for not honoring the peace agreement.


- Attractive characters
- Interesting story
- Battle through various character combinations
- Fortress reconstruction and side stories for each character

content_descriptors.notes: There is a fellow character with a sexy appearance.

detailed_description:
Andalun and Confunia, ruled by the Goddess of Order and Goddess of Chaos.
One day, the Goddess of Chaos disappears and monster queens appear in Confunia.
To keep the monster queens in check, Traborn, the leader of the Knights of Order, went on an expedition to Confunia under orders from the Goddess of Order.
Through the expedition, Traborn personally obtained an oath of loyalty from all the monster queens of Confunia.
He made himself Overlord of Confunia and signed a peace treaty with the Andalun.
And Traborn fell into a deep sleep to control the power he received from the Monster Queens...
When he woke up after a long time, the promised peace did not exist.



Gather monster queens and rebuild your castle.
You must take back your power and hold them accountable for not honoring the peace agreement.

- Interesting story
- Battle through various character combinations

name: Queen's Loyalty

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: All newer version of Windows 10 (newer than version 1909.1350) and Windows 11 with support for DirectX 12 Agility SDK are supported.
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD, 2.5 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 12 (with Shader Model 6.6 atomics), or Vulkan (VK_KHR_shader_atomic_int64)
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Gather monster queens and rebuild your castle. You must take back your power and hold them accountable for not honoring the peace agreement.
